subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mats Zuccarello, whom the Rangers were eager to re-sign last month, scored the only goal of a shootout on Wednesday to give the Rangers a vital victory over the Maple Leafs.
snippet: Mats Zuccarello, whom the Rangers were eager to re-sign last month, scored the only goal of a shootout on Wednesday to give the Rangers a vital victory over the Maple Leafs.
